skill.name: context7-integration
skill.description:
Use when integrating Context7 (knowledge/context store) for document ingestion,
semantic search, or scoped context retrieval.
Triggers for: uploading documents, searching knowledge base, filtering by role/tenant,
or providing AI with document-grounded context.
NOT for: general database queries, file storage without context semantics, or non-document content.

security_audit.summary: This is a documentation/reference skill containing code examples for Context7 integration. The verification script only reads files for validation. No malicious patterns detected. Network calls use standard authenticated API requests to Context7 endpoints.

content.value_statement: Building AI-powered applications requires grounded context from documents. This skill provides ready-to-use code for integrating Context7 knowledge store with document ingestion, semantic search, and role-based access control for ERP systems.
actual_capabilities: Ingest single or batch documents into Context7 knowledge store
Perform semantic search with role and tenant filtering
Shape and format retrieved context for AI prompts
Implement multi-tenancy with school_id namespace isolation
Build FastAPI endpoints for knowledge management
Create React hooks for frontend search functionality
limitations: Requires running Context7 service instance and API credentials
Does not include PDF text extraction (requires PyPDF2 dependency)
Semantic search quality depends on document chunking strategy
Token limits must be managed for large context responses

use_cases.title: Build Knowledge APIs
use_cases.description: Create FastAPI endpoints for document ingestion and semantic search with role-based access control.

use_cases.title: Add Search UI
use_cases.description: Implement React search hooks and components for knowledge base queries with context display.

use_cases.title: Ground AI Responses
use_cases.description: Provide document-grounded context to AI models using shaped context formatting and token limits.

prompt_templates.title: Basic Document Ingest
prompt_templates.scenario: Upload a document to knowledge base
prompt_templates.prompt: Use the Context7 client to ingest a document with title, module, category, and role-based permissions. The document is stored at docs/policies/attendance-policy.md

prompt_templates.title: Search with Filters
prompt_templates.scenario: Search knowledge base with tenant isolation
prompt_templates.prompt: Search the Context7 knowledge base for information about fee refunds. Filter by school_id and user role. Return top 5 relevant chunks with similarity above 0.7.

prompt_templates.title: Batch Ingestion
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a batch ingestion script to upload all markdown files from docs/faq/ directory to Context7. Each file should have module=faq and category=faq.

prompt_templates.title: Context Shaping
prompt_templates.prompt: Use ContextShaper to format search results into prompt-safe format. Include source citations, limit to 4000 tokens, and truncate at paragraph boundaries.

output_examples.input: Search the knowledge base for information about student registration procedures
output: Top result provides step-by-step guide for registering new students including required documents, verification steps, and enrollment confirmation.

best_practices: Always validate documents for PII before ingestion to prevent data leaks
Use namespace isolation and school_id filtering for multi-tenant ERP systems
Set appropriate max_chunks and min_similarity thresholds to control result quality
anti_patterns: Ingesting sensitive documents without access control metadata
Returning full document content without similarity scoring or source attribution
Bypassing role-based filters when querying knowledge base

faq.question: What is Context7 and how does it work?
faq.answer: Context7 is a knowledge store for document ingestion and semantic search. It chunks documents and enables retrieval-augmented generation with role-based access control.

faq.question: Does this skill work with Claude Code?
faq.answer: Yes. The skill provides code patterns compatible with Claude, Codex, and Claude Code. Integration follows standard MCP patterns for tool usage.

faq.question: How do I set up the Context7 API credentials?
faq.answer: Set CONTEXT7_API_KEY and CONTEXT7_API_URL environment variables. The client uses these for authenticated requests to your Context7 instance.

faq.question: Is my data safe when ingesting documents?
faq.answer: Data safety depends on your deployment. The skill includes role-based access controls and multi-tenancy support. Review documents for PII before ingestion.

faq.question: What document formats are supported?
faq.answer: Markdown, HTML, and plain text are natively supported. PDF extraction requires PyPDF2 library. The skill handles file type detection by extension.

faq.question: How does this compare to vector databases like Pinecone?
faq.answer: Context7 provides knowledge-specific features like role-based access, document metadata filtering, and context shaping utilities out of the box.
